Only on the market since September, we’ve been getting plenty of deals bringing costs down from its $2,799 full price, with today’s rate matching its Black Friday pricing and only being beaten out by the $1,599, $1,519, and $1,499 rates that all popped up in various stages of Prime Day savings over one week in October. items.title: Reddit is testing verification
items.summary: Reddit is starting to test verified profiles, the company announced today. items.title: OSHA investigating new crane accident at SpaceX’s Starbase facility
items.summary: A subcontractor says he was crushed by a metal support, breaking his hip, knee, and tibia. He's suing SpaceX and the construction company that employed him.

items.title: Marco Rubio bans Calibri font at State Department for being too DEI
items.summary: Calibri, which could make documents easier to read for the vision impaired, was apparently installed in 2023 by the department’s then-DEI office. Rubio’s memo has designated Times New Roman as his tenure’s official font, stating it will “restore decorum and professionalism” to documents.

items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Govee is returning its latest Matter Outdoor UpDown Wall Light back to Black Friday low pricing of $89.99 shipped, while its 2-pack bundle is down at its second-lowest rate of $169.99 shipped. Since its release back at the end of July with its $130 full price tag, we’ve mostly seen the previous discounts keeping costs above $100, except for the fall to $97 and then $90 that appeared during the Black Friday week sale event. Now, the brand is giving folks a second chance at its lowest tracked pricing, saving you $40 on the newest descendant from the popular Matter Outdoor Wall Light (with solo or dual-packs) that starts from $69.99 shipped right now.

items.title: Jedi vibes await with Anker’s palm-reading eufy FamiLock E34, S3, and S3 Max Matter smart locks at lows from $180
items.summary:
Through its official eufy Amazon storefront, Anker is offering Black Friday-level savings on three of its latest smart lock options with palm vein recognition and more. Things start with the FamiLock E34 Smart Lock with Matter at $179.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page $14 off coupon. This smarter security device would normally cost you $280 with the combined savings we’re seeing here, which is dropping the cost back to its all-time lowest that we only previously saw during Black Friday two weeks ago. Likewise, you also have to option to score the upgraded FamiLock S3 Smart Lock at a new all-time low of $229.49 shipped, after clipping its on-page coupon, or the most recent FamiLock S3 Max Smart Lock returning to $279.99 shipped, after clipping its on-page coupon. These devices join a lineup of other Anker eufy security deals that we rounded together, which you can browse in full here.

items.title: Amazon changes how copyright protection is applied to Kindle Direct’s self-published e-books
items.summary: Amazon says it will allow authors to offer their DRM-free e-books in the EPUB and PDF formats through its self-publishing platform, Kindle Direct Publishing. Starting on January 20, 2026, authors who set their titles as DRM-free will see their books made available in these more open formats.
